content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
It's going well thanks! I just got done with work and now I'm relaxing on the couch.
That sounds nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a stylist at a local boutique. I love helping people feel their best!
That's awesome! I love that you get to help people in that way.
Me too! It's the best part of my job.
I'm a personal trainer. I also help people feel their best!
That's awesome! I'm sure you're great at it.
Thank you! I try my best.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite band is Rancid.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a punk band. You should check them out!
I will! I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
Awesome! Let me know what you think.
